
Test doc
========

Multiple inputs and outputs:

.. terminal::
    :copy:
    :scroll:
    :user: author
    :host: canonical
    :dir: ~/path
    :input: echo 'hello'

    hello
    :input: echo 'goodbye'

    goodbye

No input:

.. terminal::

    no input
